title: Account Access Denied
description: User cannot access account despite correct login details

title: Dashboard Lag
description: Dashboard lags for several minutes when loading data

title: Email Service Outage
description: Delayed or undelivered emails for certain users

title: Profile Update Not Saving
description: Changes to user profile not being saved

title: Internal Server Error 503
description: Unable to generate reports due to server errors

title: Password Reset Link Not Sent
description: User is not receiving password reset emails

title: Search Function Slow
description: Search results take too long to appear

title: Invoice Error
description: Incorrect invoice totals when applying discounts

title: App Crashes on iOS
description: App crashes when accessing user settings on iPhone

title: Push Notification Glitch
description: Push notifications are not making sound

title: File Upload Error
description: Unable to upload large PDF files over 50MB

title: Mobile View Layout Issue
description: Page layout breaks on small mobile screens

title: Language Setting Error
description: The app is displaying text in French instead of English

title: 2FA Verification Failure
description: Users are not receiving 2FA codes for login
